author: Reuters Editorial
title: Emcor Group Posts Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.94 From Continuing Operations
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - EMCOR Group Inc:
* EMCOR GROUP, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 REVENUE $1.9 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.81 BILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.94 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.85 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* BACKLOG AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 WAS $3.95 BILLION, COMPARED TO BOTH $3.97 BILLION AT END OF Q1 OF 2017 AND $3.79 BILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017
* EMCOR GROUP - MAINTAINS ITS FY18 REVENUE GUIDANCE OF $7.6 BILLION TO $7.7 BILLION AND FY18 DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS GUIDANCE OF $4.10 TO $4.70
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.85, REVENUE VIEW $1.81 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
